class.name: diff_vesc_can_ros2_control/DiffBotSystemHardware
class.description: The ros2_control DiffBot implementation ready for VESC integration. It uses velocity command and position state interface. This is based on the reference implementation for differential-drive mobile robots.

class.name: diff_vesc_can_ros2_control/VescCanDiffBotSystemHardware
class.description: Hardware interface for DIFFBOT with VESC CAN. Sends velocity commands and reads odometry via CAN using the VESC protocol. Modular for real and simulated hardware.
